title: List of all Android custom dialog  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android custom dialog  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: CustomActivityOnCrash
repoList.description: Android library that allows launching a custom activity when your app crashes, instead of showing the hated "Unfortunately, X has stopped" dialog.

repoList.name: android-material-app-rating
repoList.description: This library allows to use customized Rating Dialog inside applications.

repoList.name: AestheticDialogs
repoList.description: 📱 An Android Library for 💫fluid, 😍beautiful, 🎨custom Dialogs.

repoList.name: DroidDialog
repoList.description: Android Library for showing Material Dialog with little customization

repoList.name: CustomAlertViewDialogue
repoList.description: Custom AlertView Dialogue is the world's most advanced alert view library. Custom AlertView Dialogue includes simple message popups, confirmation alerts, selector popups, action sheet bottom menus, and input/feedback contact forms.

repoList.name: CustomPermissionsDialogue
repoList.description: Custom Permissions Dialogue is the only permissions library that supports ALL permission request scenarios. This library handles multiple edge cases such as not enabling all permissions or permanently rejecting a permission request.

repoList.name: CircularDialogs
repoList.description: Android dialog library to give user feedback about the common operations like Success, Warning and Errors.

repoList.name: Toaster-Library
repoList.description: :ticket: Android library, Custom toast and dialog (2018)

repoList.name: Android-Shortify
repoList.description: An Android library used for making an Android application more faster with less amount of code. Shortify for Android provides basic functionalities of view and resource binding, view customization, JSON parsing, AJAX, various readymade dialogs and much more.

repoList.name: Common
repoList.description: Common is a basic component library for android    ——UI Components, MVP Base, MVP Customization, Auto Loader, Auto Pager, Components, Tools; UI组件化，MVP Base，MVP定制, 自动加载，自动分页Pager, 模块化, 功能组件, 更多工具类...
